fulltext:
NGUYEN CAP TIEN
CURRICULUM VITAE
PERSONAL DETAILS
Name:
Date of Birth:
Nationality:
Vietnamese
Gender: Male
Phone: Email:
STRONG POINTS

Have many working experiences, especially with large and complex systems.

Good and fast in finding and solving problems

Professional working style, self-management, easy to fit in almost environments, familiar with
modern working methods.

Simple, loyal, enthusiastic, open-minded, careful, and resourceful. Optimistic and sociable with people
CAREER GOALS

Desire to work and learn new techniques. A position has many technical challenges, working
with large and complex system.

Suitable for (from most suitable to less):
o
Solution architecture: wide work experience allows me to know which solution is best
suited for the project's purposes.
o
Project manager: effective management teams up to 12 people
o
Technical leader: strong technical background and knowledge. Always update
new technologies.
o
Technical Consultant and presale: know what we should ask and how to make trust, as well
as make reasonable estimates
o DevOps
o
Full stack Developer
TECHNICAL PROFILE

Full-stack DevOps. Can work well with backend, frontend development, deploy or system admin.

Have 10 years of experience in Java development, include in J2SE and J2EE. Have 6 years of
experience in PHP development, especially on Magento, Drupal and Zend Framework.

Have strong technical background and knowledge. Always update new technologies.

Good in designing/optimization system.

Quick learning for the new system/technology.

Have many working experiences with large and complex systems.

Programming languages: Expert in JAVA, PHP. Experienced in frontend/backend development.

Framework: Spring, Zend, Laravel.

Databases: Oracle, MySQL, MSSQL. NoSQL: Mongo, Redis.

Webserver: Apache, Nginx, Tomcat, Glassfish, Jetty

Search engine: Lucene, Solr.

Frontend technologies: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, LESS, Bootstrap, JQuery, AngularJS, etc...

Software architecture: MVC, MVVM, HMVC, Microservices, CQRS/ES.

Continuous Deployment: Jenkins.

Big data: Hadoop, IMDG (Hazelcast, Apache Ignite)

Source Control tools: GIT, SVN.

Project Management tools: Jira, Trello.
Other tools & components: specific to each project

WORK EXPERIENCE
[05/2018 – Now] Eastgate Software – Solution Architecture
Project
Siemens – Airport baggage handling system
Role
Technical Leader
Project size
6 developers, 1 tester in 4 years (I worked for 6 months)
We only work in some modules. The whole system includes many teams
from many countries, each team work on some modules
Description
- Famous Airport baggage handling system. Deployed on 140 airports
- Handling baggage from when you checked. Routing/allocate it via many
Conveyors, Storage, Container until it reach destination.
- Learn how to work with enterprise standard process, learn how to minimize
mistakes and control quality in very large scale.
Responsibilities
- Technical leader
Technologies
- Languages: Java
- Technology: Java, Oracle, GWT and many exclusive technologies.
Project
Dasan Zhone – Dasan Terminal Management System 2
Role
Person In Charge
Project size
4 developers, 3 tester in 5 months
Description
- Dasan Zhone is one of the biggest provider for telecommunications
networking equipment.
- Terminal config usually by direct access to device and config use device
management interface. Each device have different management
interface/feature/parameters so install/management/config/replace/update
terminal on large scale (> 1.000 device) is very painful.
- They want to build a management system allow:
- Remotely config many devices and allow install/replace device is
just plug new device, new device will automatic config to work as old
device
- Working with many kinds of devices from different
manufacture/brand/model/protocol
- Make some rule to allow devices reacting to event/schedule/data
- High availability & reliability & easy extend systems based on
Microservice pattern
- We write a translator to translate config/command from Universal protocol
to different device protocols
Responsibilities
- Follow project from presale to finish
- Presale, Technical Consultant, Solution Architecture, Project Manager
- Main developer (around 70%)
Technologies
- Languages: Java
- Technology: Java, Spring Boot, Kafka.
Project
GravityRD – Recommendation & Personalization Solution
Role
Person In Charge for Vietnam market
Description
- GravityRD is a Hungary company provide Recommendation &
Personalization Solution. Their solution is one of best commercial solution
(which you can buy)
- They have many customers in VN: Tiki, Vietnamwork, NguyenKim,
DatVietVAC and want to extend more.
- Onsite in Hungary for 2 months
Responsibilities
- Person In Charge and contact point for Vietnam market
- Bridge between Vietnamese customer and Hungary team
Technologies
- Languages: Java
- Technology: Java, Kafka and many exclusive technologies.
Project
VTVCab-on Recommendation System
Role
Project manager
Project size
4 developers, 1 tester in 1 year
Description
Provide video recommendation for VTVCab-on based on historical personal
view data
Responsibilities
Project manager and team manager (takeover from old PM)
Technologies
- Languages: Java
- Technology: Spark, Hadoop
[07/2017 – 04/2018] Cung Ten Viet – Technical Leader

Developing game server for online game. Around 4.000.000 users with 20.000-50.000 ccu.

Know how to build low-latency and high concurrent system.
[09/2016 – 05/2017] Crystal Techs Co LTD – Founder & Technical manager

A startup company of me and 2 friends.

Working as an outsource and consultant company

Focus on Singapore, Australia, US market
[06/2014 – 05/2016] Niteco Vietnam - Senior Developer
Project Dialing.se
Role
Developer, Technical Leader
Project size
4 developers, 1 tester in 5 year (I worked for 2 year)
Description
- Dialing.se provided a comprehensive solution for telesales base on SaaS
model. Customer who want to setup their telesales system won't need build
it by theirself, they should hire it from us and start working immediately.
Including: CRM, phone call, call recording, report and statistic, special feature
base on customer request.
- My biggest project with more than 1500 customers and more than 100
customer’s specific logic. We must maintain a system with ~70 servers,
400GB MySql database, 20TB sound file.
- Have high demand on low latency and high throughput system
Responsibilities
- Backend/Frontend development a feature base on Dialing or customer
request
- Maintain, fix bug, monitor for whole system. Ensure it is working fine
with Service-level agreement 99.9%
- Management Dialing.se server with around 100 servers.
Technologies
- Languages: PHP, NodeJS, Perl, Java, HTML, JavaScript
- DB: Mysql
- Framework & Library: a custom build of Zend Framework,
AngularJS, Socket.io, RabbitMQ, Jquery.
[07/2013 – 05/2014] SmartOSC - Senior Developer
Project XPOS
Role
Developer, Team Leader
Project size
3 developer, 2 tester in 3 months
Description
- XPOS is point of sales extension, integrated with Magento, a famous
ecommerce platform. Used in vending machines in supermarkets or
restaurants, etc....
- The previous version is version 2, complained is too slow.
- Rebuilt it with new architecture, making it faster a lot. As well as adding a
lot of new features such as can use when lost connections, refunds, money
managers at each machine, etc...
- Have Sao khue 2015 award and 3.000.000 USD revenue
Responsibilities
- Gather request send from sales team/customer feedback to research
feature. Write user story/task
- Build architecture
- Backend/Frontend development
Technologies
- Languages: PHP, HTML, JavaScript
- DB: MySQL
- Framework & Library: Magento, JQuery, Nano template
Project Sportsgirl
Role
Developer, Team Leader
Project size
4 developer, 1 tester in 2 months
Description
- Sportsgirl.com.au is a women's clothing chain in Australia. They have 150
stores in Australia.
- They want to rebuild their e-commerce system form old .NET to Magento
EE.
- This is the pilot project of SmartOSC with IE (an media agency in
Australia), so it was very important.
Responsibilities
- Gather request send from sales team/customer feedback to research
feature.
- Build architecture
- Team manager and task management
- Backend/Frontend development
- Migrate data from old system to Magento
Technologies
- Languages: PHP, HTML, JavaScript
- DB: MySQL
- Framework & Library: Magento, JQuery

Some small project: Built ecommerce website based on PHP, Magento, Drupal base on
customer requirements.
 Example  http://www.scanlantheodore.com/
 http://www.sportsgirl.com.au/
 http://www.sassandbide.com/
 http://www.autorestore.co.uk/
[03/2013– 07/2013] Thai Ha Company - Founder & Team leader

Constructed website: baocongthuong.com.vn - a CMS systems for Newspaper of Industry and
Trade - Ministry of Industry and Trade

Built a Ads networking system.
[03/2011– 12/2013] Mua&Ban Newspaper - Developer

Worked with 7x67 SMS system, built SMS gateway and SMS services.

Built and managed PBX System VoIP based Asterisk for 2 top services 19,006,695 and
19,006,868, Managed VoIP Systems, programmed additional APIs, backend for the client tools.

Built and managed backend system for muaban.net mobile page.

Programmed many additional applications as requested for Mua&Bán newspapers such as
support email system.

Designed and built ads optimization system. In Mua&Ban, we have the largest classified advertising
sites (muaban.net) in Vietnam. We need to analyze the access history of users to find out their
habbit, what they are looking for and combined with many other factors to choose the most
relevant ads for him. Increased hit rate for ads.
[08/2009– 03/2011] VCCorp - Developer

Working with 8x01 SMS system.

Wap Design and Construction.

Designed and developed the advertising system on wap.

Designed and constructed of server applications for SoHaChat, SoHaNews, MShop (J2ME
apps). Ensured good operation at high load (10.000 CCU in one server)
EDUCATION & TRAININGS
9/2004 - 7/2009
B.Eng in Information and Communication Technology - Hanoi University of
Technology.
